It's Slinkity time

‚òùÔ∏è Who generated that heading?

That heading came from a wrapper layout. If you check out this page's source (), you'll notice some frontmatter applied between those --- blocks:

title:
The title we'll apply as the page heading and the browser tab title. You'll see this applied using {`It's Slinkity time`} in the layout file described below üëá
layout:
The name of the layout file to apply. In this case, layout: layout translates to _includes/layout.njk since 11ty looks in the _includes folder by default.

You'll notice this page is wrapped in a layout. This pulls in a few parameters using 11ty's data cascade:

  • title uses the "title" attribute from our page's front matter.
  • content | safe renders our page.

If you're reading this from your browser... congrats! You just built (or dev server-ed) you're first Slinkity site üëä
